definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pursue, chase, be continuous (Ar. t.arada pursue; II. prolong one's voice; VIII. continue uninterruptedly: As. ṭarâdu, drive away COT:Gloss, so Aram. t.rad, [[טְרַד]])—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. act. [[וְדֶלֶף טׂרֵד]] Pr 19:13 a continuous dripping, dropping, i.e. one in which one drop pursues another; so [[טוֹרֵד]] ´[[ד]] Pr 27:15; in both sim. of a contentious woman.
